values: 头脑；大脑；心智；智慧；智力；思维方式；注意力；意愿；意向；记忆力；意识；思想；理智；主意；想法；观念；心态
（请求允许或客气地请人做事）介意；对某事烦恼；苦恼；注意；留心；照顾；照料；监管；遵守；遵循指示；服从命令；听从；愿意做

synonym.mean: 理智，精神；意见；智力；记忆力

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 愚蠢的；不小心的；不需要动脑筋的；不顾虑的
有意的；有思想的；具有意志的
不在乎，不用心；没头脑，精神缺失

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。
侧重不受感情或意志左右的冷静思考或领悟能力。
指先天的才能、智力、意识等，隐含小聪明意味。
较文雅，也可指明智的言行。
使用广泛，无褒贬之意。强调诸如认识、记忆、思考、决定等的智慧功能。
(多用复数brains)强调理解能力和独立的或者首创性的思维能力。
指处理或对付问题或情况的特殊才智；也指运用、展开智慧的能力。
一般用词，侧重专心于某事。
一般指经过思维活动而注意到。
指用心地去观察，了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应，侧重结果。
语气比notice强，指不仅注意到，而且记录下来，侧重注意的认真与仔细。

word_group.brief_definition: 没关系, 不要紧, 不关你的事；更不用说, 更谈不上；别管, 不用在意
思维导图；心智图；思维图
(对刚说过的话加以补充, 尤使语气减弱)请注意, 告诉你吧

bilingual.source: I don't mind wearing a school uniform.
I hope you won't mind me asking about.
Do you mind if I ask another question?
bilingual.target: 你介意我再问一个问题吗？

bilingual.source: Please don't mind that she didn't greet you.
bilingual.target: 请不要介意她没有向你打招呼。

bilingual.source: Sounds great! Do you mind if I borrow your book?
bilingual.target: 听起来很棒！你介意我借你的书吗？

list.abstract: mind（英[maɪnd]，美[maɪnd]），英语单词，作名词为头脑；智力；思维能力，作动词为介意；在乎；注意。短语搭配有keep in mind（记住）。例句为“Harry, you should mind your manners.（哈里，你应该注意你的举止。）” 该单词名词的近义词为opinion，及物动词的近义词为concentrate upon，不及物动词的近义词为take notice，相关反义词为forget。
mind，2014年泰国妙龄小姐大赛冠军。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you can't. I don't mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那也不行。我不介意。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mind paying my dues, you know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不介意吃苦。

yingyinNormal.en: You mind if we stay up a while?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你介意我们在这里先待一会儿吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Buzz, mind if I squeeze in next to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴斯，你介意我挤在你旁边吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind, George. You can choose the fruit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别介意，乔治。你可以选水果。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you staying? Er, yes, if, if you don't mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要留下来吗？是的，如果您不介意。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you mind if we talked about Mr. Wolowitz now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你介不介意我们来谈一下沃罗威茨先生？

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind, George. You can share Daddy's ice cream. I'm sure he won't mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别介意，乔治。你可以跟爸爸分享一个冰淇淋。我确信他不会介意的。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't mind me asking you the questions? I don't mind. Am I ever going to make you say yes or no?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不会介意我问你什么问题的对不对。我不会介意的。你觉得我能让你说出是或不是嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I don't mind a male nanny, but I do draw the line at male wet nurse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道的，我是不介意男保姆，但是我倒是很介意男的洗澡护士。

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind, George. You can share Daddy's ice cream. I'm sure he won't mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系的，乔治，你可以吃爸爸的冰淇淋，他是不会介意的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ok. Do you mind if we ask you some questions about the father?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不会介意我问几个有关孩子父亲的问题吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Do you mind if I spend the weekend playing video games with the guys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你介意我这个周末跟他们几个玩网游吗？

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't mind, we'd like our law firm to sit in on this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你们不介意，我们希望让律师来解决此事。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, hang on, dad. Barry's always been our driver. Barry don't mind. Do you, Barry? No. No, that's fine. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等，爸爸。以前都是巴里开车。你并不介意，对吧，巴里？对，我不介意。你看。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mind at all, Daisy. You can help him enrich the bechamel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点都不介意，黛西。你可以帮他弄调味酱。

yingyinNormal.en: And, as if that weren't enough, his pocketbook doesn't mind either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是彷佛这还不够，但是他的钱袋子并不介意。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh honey, I'll say good-bye to you at the car if you don't mind the puss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以替你送行，只要你不介意我眼睛化脓。

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't mind me asking, is he prone to such outburst?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不介意我问一下的话，他是有这种歇斯底里的倾向吗？

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Then maybe you won't mind if me and my friend take a look around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，那或许你不介意我和我的朋友到处看看。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 注意力; 心思; 意愿
小心; 注意; 在意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 莽撞的；无所顾忌的；不顾；盲目的；随心所欲的；没想到；机械简单的；无须动脑筋的
adj. 具有…头脑的；有…思想的；有…观念的；对…有兴趣的；热衷于…的

word_family.mean: n. 头脑；智力；思维能力；注意力；心思；思维；意愿；记忆力；意向；正常思维

sense_info_list.en: a person's mental processes contrasted with physical action

examination_example.sentence: One survey from Accenture found that 88 percent of graduating seniors this year chose their major with a job in <highlight>mind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃森哲咨询公司一项调查发现，今年毕业的大四学生中，88%的人选择专业时都考虑到了工作。

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>mind</highlight> seems to be able to cope and the information is stored away neatly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的大脑似乎能够处理这些问题，信息也被整齐地储存起来。

examination_example.sentence: But as the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) reviews the company's application, it should keep in <highlight>mind</highlight> what promises from Entergy are worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但当核管理委员会（NRC）审阅该公司的申请时，他们应该考虑 Entergy 的承诺有多少价值。

sense_info_list.en: a person's intellect/memory; the state of normal mental functioning in a person; a very intelligent person

examination_example.sentence: It was the purpose and responsibility of great <highlight>minds</highlight> to go forth and seek out the truth, which they believed to be founded in knowledge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伟大智者的目的和责任是去探索真理，他们相信真理是建立在知识之上的。

examination_example.sentence: You'd think this might fuel the efficiency <highlight>mind</highlight>-set, but in fact, Eberle notes, such ritualistic behaviour helps us "step outside time's flow" into "soul time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会认为这会助长效率思维定势，但事实上，埃伯勒指出，这种仪式行为帮助我们“走出时间的流动”进入“灵魂时间”

examination_example.sentence: No <highlight>mind</highlight>-set could be worse for losing yourself in a book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一本书里迷失自己是最糟糕的心态。

examination_example.sentence: Offering up such a theory during a time of high tension between scientific and religious <highlight>minds</highlight> was branded as heresy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在科学和宗教思想高度紧张的时期提出这样的理论会被贴上异端邪说的标签。

examination_example.sentence: During the Renaissance, the great <highlight>minds</highlight> of Nicolaus Copernicus, Johannes Kepler and Galileo Galilei demonstrated the power of scientific study and discovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在文艺复兴时期，尼古拉斯·哥白尼、约翰·开普勒和伽利略·伽利略的伟大思想展示了科学研究和发现的力量。

examination_example.sentence: Credibility "happens" to a discovery claim — a process that corresponds to what philosopher Annette Baier has described as the commons of the <highlight>mind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项科学发现声明被认为可信——这个过程同哲学家安妮特·拜尔描述的“思想的一致性”相符。

sense_info_list.en: an opinion formed by judging something
sense_info_list.zh: 注意力; 心思; 意愿

examination_example.sentence: Parents are changing their <highlight>minds</highlight> about education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母正在改变他们对教育的看法。

examination_example.sentence: It's also a good idea to shop daily instead of weekly, because, being human, you'll sometimes change your <highlight>mind</highlight> about what you fancy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天购物而不是每周购物也是一个好主意，因为作为人，你有时会改变对你喜欢的东西的想法。

sense_info_list.en: be annoyed or worried by something

examination_example.sentence: Never <highlight>mind</highlight> the quality, then, count the number.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那就别管质量了，数数数量吧。

sense_info_list.en: be careful of, or give attention to something
sense_info_list.zh: 小心; 注意; 在意

sense_info_list.en: take care of someone or something
to pay attention to what sb says, and obey them

word_usage.usage: 作动词指“对（某事）烦恼、苦恼、焦虑；介意某事”时，常用于疑问句或否定句，不用于被动句。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不费心思地; 愚蠢地
adj. 莽撞的；无所顾忌的；不顾；盲目的；随心所欲的；没想到；机械简单的；无须动脑筋的
adj. 头脑简单的；迟钝的；无知的

word_family.mean: n. 头脑；智力；思维能力；注意力；心思；思维；意愿；记忆力；意向；正常思维

sense_info_list.en: a person's mental processes contrasted with physical action

examination_example.sentence: Both absent-<highlight>minded</highlight> doodling and copying from life have been shown to positively affect your memory and visual perception.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活中心不在焉的涂鸦和临摹都被证明对你的记忆和视觉有积极的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi needed to achieve the goal that was set in his <highlight>mind</highlight> as an adolescent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi需要实现他青少年时期心中设定的目标。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike-<highlight>minded</highlight> academics say the inheritability of human traits is scientifically unsound.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 持不同观点的学者说，人类特征的可继承性在科学上是不可靠的。

sense_info_list.en: an opinion formed by judging something

examination_example.sentence: Convincing someone to change their <highlight>mind</highlight> is really the process of convincing them to change their tribe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说服别人改变主意其实就是说服他们改变自己的部落。

examination_example.sentence: When it comes to changing people's <highlight>minds</highlight>, it is very difficult to jump from one side to another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当涉及到改变人们的想法时，从一个方面跳到另一个方面是非常困难的。

examination_example.sentence: You can't expect someone to change their <highlight>mind</highlight> if you take away their community too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便你让他们离开所属的群体，也不能指望他们会改变主意。

sense_info_list.en: be annoyed or worried by something

examination_example.sentence: They don't seem to <highlight>mind</highlight> paying for additional services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们似乎不介意为额外服务付费。

sense_info_list.en: a very intelligent person

examination_example.sentence: In the opinion of some of the world's best scientific <highlight>minds</highlight>, we don't yet have any answer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一些世界上最好的科学家看来，我们还没有任何答案。

sense_info_list.en: be careful of, or give attention to something
take care of someone or something

word_usage.usage:
“介意做某事”用mind doing sth.表达，不用mind to do sth.。
示例：帮我关上门好吗?
误 Would you mind to close the door for me?
正 Would you mind closing the door for me?

mind后可接宾语从句。
示例：I don't mind what I eat.
吃啥我都不介意你。

回答Do you mind...?和Would you mind...?这类问题，需注意“不介意”用no，“介意”用yes。
示例：你介意我呆会儿来叫你吗? ——我不介意。
误 Do you mind if I call you later? —Yes.
正 Do you mind if I call you later? —No, not at all.

mind用于否定的祈使句时，习惯上多用“Never mind...”表达，而不用“Don't mind...”。
示例：别在乎天气好坏，今晚来看我。
误 Don't mind the weather; come and see me this evening.
正 Never mind the weather; come and see me this evening.

下定决心用“make up one’s mind”表达，后常加不定式。
示例：He has made up his mind to go.
他已经下定决心要走了。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用心地去观察, 了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
语气比 notice 强, 指不仅注意到, 而且记录下来, 侧重注意的认真与仔细。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应, 侧重结果。
(多用复数 brains)强调理解能力和独立的或者首创性的思维能力。
侧重不受感情或意志左右的冷静思考或领悟能力。
指处理或对付问题或情况的特殊才智; 也指运用、展开智慧的能力。
使用广泛, 无褒贬之意。强调诸如认识、记忆、思考、决定等的智慧功能。
指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑, 主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 头脑; 意识; 思维

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 趣味相投的；志同道合的
adj. 莽撞的；无所顾忌的；不顾；盲目的；随心所欲的；没想到；机械简单的；无须动脑筋的

word_family.mean: n. 头脑；智力；思维能力；注意力；心思；思维；意愿；记忆力；意向；正常思维

sense_info_list.en: a person's mental processes contrasted with physical action
sense_info_list.zh: 头脑; 意识; 思维

examination_example.sentence: Most people's <highlight>minds</highlight> function at a high level even in their later years, according to researcher Timothy Salthouse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员蒂莫西·索尔特豪斯表示，即使到了晚年，大多数人的思维能力仍处于较高水平。

examination_example.sentence: The important thing is for all of us to keep in <highlight>mind</highlight> the real goal and the longer, bigger picture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是我们所有人都要牢记实际的目标和更长远、更大的图景。

examination_example.sentence: What does Timothy Salthouse say about people's <highlight>minds</highlight> in most cases?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂莫西·索尔特豪斯在大多数情况下对人们的思想有什么看法?

sense_info_list.en: be annoyed or worried by something

examination_example.sentence: But just quickly, if you don't <highlight>mind</highlight>, could you tell me approximately how much a typical installation costs, like, say, four panels?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果你不介意的话，你能告诉我一个典型的安装大概要花多少钱吗，比如，四个面板?

examination_example.sentence: If you don't <highlight>mind</highlight>, I'd like to pick your brains a bit more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不介意的话，我想再向你请教一下。

examination_example.sentence: Do you <highlight>mind</highlight> describing the chairs that were delivered to your apartment, Mr. Brown?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布朗先生，您方便描述一下给您送过来的椅子是什么样吗？

sense_info_list.en: an opinion formed by judging something

examination_example.sentence: Research published in recent years has shown that running changes your brain and <highlight>mind</highlight> in some fascinating ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来发表的研究表明，跑步以一些迷人的方式改变你的大脑和思维。

sense_info_list.en: be careful of; or give attention to something

examination_example.sentence: Nothing serious, <highlight>mind</highlight> you, but he damaged someone's car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没什么大不了的，但你要小心，他弄坏了别人的车。

examination_example.sentence: The city's current mayor, Luigi Brugnaro, has ridiculed UNESCO and told it to <highlight>mind</highlight> its own business, while continuing to support the cruise ship industry, which employs 5, 000 Venice residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尼斯现任市长 Luigi Brugnaro 嘲笑联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)，让它管好自己的事，同时继续支持雇用了5000名威尼斯居民的游轮业。

sense_info_list.en: a very intelligent person
take care of someone or something

word_usage.usage:
“介意做某事”用mind doing sth.表达，不用mind to do sth.。
示例：帮我关上门好吗?
误 Would you mind to close the door for me?
正 Would you mind closing the door for me?

mind后可接宾语从句。
示例：I don't mind what I eat.
吃啥我都不介意你。

mind用于否定的祈使句时，习惯上多用“Never mind...”表达，而不用“Don't mind...”。
示例：别在乎天气好坏，今晚来看我。
误 Don't mind the weather; come and see me this evening.
正 Never mind the weather; come and see me this evening.

回答Do you mind...?和Would you mind...?这类问题，需注意“不介意”用no，“介意”用yes。
示例：你介意我呆会儿来叫你吗? ——我不介意。
误 Do you mind if I call you later? —Yes.
正 Do you mind if I call you later? —No, not at all.

下定决心用“make up one’s mind”表达，后常加不定式。
示例：He has made up his mind to go.
他已经下定决心要走了。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用心地去观察，了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
语气比 notice 强，指不仅注意到，而且记录下来，侧重注意的认真与仔细。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应，侧重结果。
(多用复数 brains)强调理解能力和独立的或者首创性的思维能力。
侧重不受感情或意志左右的冷静思考或领悟能力。
指处理或对付问题或情况的特殊才智; 也指运用、展开智慧的能力。
使用广泛，无褒贬之意。强调诸如认识、记忆、思考、决定等的智慧功能。
指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 趣味相投的；志同道合的
adj. 意识到的；留神的；警觉的；注意的；意欲的；情愿的
adj. 具有…头脑的；有…思想的；有…观念的；对…有兴趣的；热衷于…的

word_family.mean: n. 头脑；智力；思维能力；注意力；心思；思维；意愿；记忆力；意向；正常思维

examination_example.sentence: You must keep these points in <highlight>mind</highlight> while setting your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在设定目标时，你必须记住这些要点。

examination_example.sentence: Before getting into the car, I thought I had learned the instructor's orders, but once I started the car, my <highlight>mind</highlight> went blank.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在上车之前，我以为我已经学会了教官的命令，但是一旦发动了车，我的脑子就一片空白。

examination_example.sentence: Here was an exceptionally creative <highlight>mind</highlight> at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个非常有创造力的头脑在工作。

examination_example.sentence: I didn't <highlight>mind</highlight> having a tense relationship with my brother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不介意和我兄弟关系紧张。

examination_example.sentence: Jones was shocked when she said that she didn't actually <highlight>mind</highlight> being cheated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当Jones说她实际上不介意被欺骗时，她感到震惊。

examination_example.sentence: Do you <highlight>mind</highlight> my opening the window?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你介意我打开窗户吗？

examination_example.sentence: It opens children's <highlight>mind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它打开了孩子们的思维。

examination_example.sentence: He left after seven months, physically broken and having lost his <highlight>mind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 七个月后，他离开了，身体垮了，失去了理智。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Mind</highlight> the colors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 注意颜色。

examination_example.sentence: By distracting the <highlight>mind</highlight> from the pain, music, people say, can lower stress and anxiety levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们说，通过分散思想对疼痛的注意力，音乐可以降低压力和焦虑水平。

examination_example.sentence: Curious <highlight>minds</highlight> never feel contented.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好奇的人永远不会满足。

word_usage.usage: 接动名词，不接不定式：Would you mind explaining that again? 请你再解释一遍行吗？也可接动名词的复合形式：Do you mind them talking loudly? 你介意他们大声说话吗？
接if从句：Do/Would you mind if I keep the windows closed? 如果我把窗户都关上，你介意吗？
在回答上面的问句时，如果表示同意，常说：Not at all./Of course not./Certainly not.；如果表示反对，习惯上说：I'm sorry but I do. 或直接说Yes, I do.等。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 小心; 注意; 在意
注意力; 心思; 意愿

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 没关系；不要紧；不关你的事；更不用说；更谈不上；别管；不用在意
思维导图；心智图；思维图

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 趣味相投的；志同道合的
adj. 具有…头脑的；有…思想的；有…观念的；对…有兴趣的；热衷于…的

word_family.mean: n. 头脑；智力；思维能力；注意力；心思；思维；意愿；记忆力；意向；正常思维

sense_info_list.en: a person's mental processes contrasted with physical action

examination_example.sentence: Instead, it keeps your <highlight>mind</highlight> focused and you'll be able to get more done quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，它会让你的思维集中，你将能够快速完成更多的工作。

examination_example.sentence: After class, remember to review what you have learned by reading your notes or making a <highlight>mind</highlight> map.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 课后，记得通过阅读你的笔记或制作思维导图来复习所学内容。

examination_example.sentence: His <highlight>mind</highlight> is full of strange ideas all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他脑子里一直充满奇怪的想法。

sense_info_list.en: be annoyed or worried by something

examination_example.sentence: We don't like to rush around, so we don't <highlight>mind</highlight> if people are a little late sometimes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不喜欢匆匆忙忙，所以我们不介意人们有时迟到一会儿。

examination_example.sentence: Though he knows doctors in hospitals work very long hours, he doesn't <highlight>mind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他知道医院的医生工作时间很长，但他并不介意。

examination_example.sentence: Would you <highlight>mind</highlight> taking care of my pet fish while I'm away on holiday?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我外出度假时，你介意帮我照看一下我的宠物鱼吗？

sense_info_list.en: be careful of, or give attention to something
sense_info_list.zh: 小心; 注意; 在意

examination_example.sentence: Please <highlight>mind</highlight> your head, sir.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请小心您的头，先生。

examination_example.sentence: Harry, you should <highlight>mind</highlight> your manners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈里，你应该注意你的言行举止。

examination_example.sentence: He doesn't <highlight>mind</highlight> the matter of life or death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他不在乎生死。

sense_info_list.en: an opinion formed by judging something
sense_info_list.zh: 注意力; 心思; 意愿

examination_example.sentence: Julia made up her <highlight>mind</highlight> to be a doctor after watching the news programme．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看完新闻节目后，朱莉娅下定决心要当一名医生。

examination_example.sentence: So he made up his <highlight>mind</highlight> to build his own home in the countryside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他下定决心要在农村建自己的家。

examination_example.sentence: Johnny made up his <highlight>mind</highlight> to give up smoking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰尼决定戒烟。

examination_example.sentence: We should try to express our <highlight>minds</highlight> with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该试着用它来表达我们的想法。

examination_example.sentence: But what Hoge did changed his mother's <highlight>mind</highlight> little by little.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是霍格的所作所为一点一点地改变了他母亲的想法。

examination_example.sentence: If they got better training and started winning things, they'd soon change their <highlight>minds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们得到更好的训练并开始赢得比赛，他们很快就会改变主意。

word_usage.usage:
“介意做某事”用mind doing sth.表达，不用mind to do sth.。
示例：帮我关上门好吗?
示例：Would you mind closing the door for me?

mind后可接宾语从句。
示例：I don't mind what I eat.
我不在意吃什么。

回答Do you mind...?和Would you mind...?这类问题，需注意“不介意”用no，“介意”用yes。
示例：你介意我呆会儿来叫你吗? ——我不介意。
误 Do you mind if I call you later? —Yes.
正 Do you mind if I call you later? —No, not at all.

mind用于否定的祈使句时，习惯上多用“Never mind...”表达，而不用“Don't mind...”。
示例：别在乎天气好坏，今晚来看我。
误 Don't mind the weather; come and see me this evening.
正 Never mind the weather; come and see me this evening.

下定决心用“make up one’s mind”表达，后常加不定式。
示例：He has made up his mind to go.
他已经下定决心要走了。
